price: ما [ساکنان] هیچ [شهر و] دیاری را هلاک نکردیم؛ مگر اینکه [مهلت و] اَجلی معیّن داشتند.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
